channel.title: How do i make alter recharge prayerpoints
channel.description:
Ive added an alter to my server so people can recharge there prayer points with ease.
but whats the code to add so it will recharge prayer points to max?

item.title: How do i make alter recharge prayerpoints

item.title: How do i make alter recharge prayerpoints
item.dc:creator: @warlock_999 warlock 999
item.description:
@warlock_999 wrote:

Find me id for alter and ill whip it up[br][br][size=1]Posted on: September 07, 2008, 06:37:13 am[/size][hr]Nvm here if(objectID == 10638 || objectID == 409 || objectID == 411 || objectID == 4859){ if(playerLevel[5] == getLevelForXP(playerXP[5])) { sM("You already have full Prayer points."); } else { setAnimation(645); playerLevel[5] = getLevelForXP(playerXP[5]); sendFrame126("Prayer: "+playerLevel[5]+"/"+getLevelForXP(playerXP[5])+"", 687); sendFrame126("" + getLevelForXP(playerXP[5]) + "", 4013); sendFrame126("" + playerLevel[5] + "", 4012); sM("You recharge your Prayer points."); } }

Read full topic
item.source: How do i make alter recharge prayerpoints
